name: Complete Blood Count
description: Used to look at overall health

name: Urine Analysis
description: Used to monitor certain health conditions and to diagnose urinary tract infections

name: Diabetic Profile
description: Used to determine a diabetic or prediabetic condition

name: Lipid Profile
description: Looks at the levels of cholesterol and other fats in your blood

name: Thyroid Function
description: Used to check the function of the thyroid i.e an overactive or underactive thyroid

name: Renal Function
description: Urine or blood tests that check how well the kidneys are working

name: Liver Function
description: Blood tests used to help find the cause of your symptoms and monitor liver disease or damage

name: Vitamin D
description: Measures the level of vitamin D in your blood to make sure you have enough for your body to work well

name: Vitamin B12
description: Measures the level of vitamin B12 (also called cobalamin) found in your blood

name: ECG(Electrocardiogram)
description: Test to check the heartbeat. It records the electrical signals in the heart
samplerequirements: Electrode patches attached to chest, arms and legs

name: Mammography
description: An X-ray examination of the breast that is used to detect and diagnose breast disease in women

name: LBC-HPV
description: Checks for cervical HPV infection that are likely to cause cervical cancer

name: Serum Calicum Phosphorous
description: Blood test to measure the amounf of calcium and phosphorous in your blood

name: DXA Scan
description: A DXA scan (bone density test) is a quick, painless way to check your bone health

name: Stool Examination
description: Test that can detect germs in your stool to help diagnose gastrointestinal diseases and colon cancer

name: Advanced Lipid Profile
description: Performed because standard cholesterol tests may not completely represent risk for heart disease

name: PSA(Prostate Specific Antigen)
description: Blood test that measures the level of psa, a protein made by the prostrate is measured.

name: HRCT(High-Resolution Computed Tomography)
description: Type of CT scan healthcare providers use to get detailed images of your lungs

name: PFT(Pulmonary Function Test)
description: Shows how well your lungs are working with respect to volume, capacity,rate of flow and gax exchange

name: Spiometry
description: Measures how much air and how fast you can breathe in and out of your lungs

name: Impulse Oscillometry
description: It is a noninvasive method, which uses sound waves to measure respiratory mechanics

name: Fibroscan
description: non-invasive diagnostic device used to measure liver scarring or fibrosis caused by a number of liver diseases
samplerequirements: Non Invasive probe placed on your liver

name: AFP(Alpha Fetoprotein Test)
description: A blood test performed to detect some liver disorders and some cancers in adults

name: PIVIKA(Protein Induced By Vitamin K Absence)
description: Useful tool for detection of ultrasound-detected liver nodules in cirrhotic patients
samplerequirements: Clinical examination, abdominal ultrasonography & Blood Sample

name: HBV-HIV-HCV Viral Load Test
description: Blood test that measures the amount of HIV/HBV/HCV in a sample of your blood

name: SerumHBSAG-HIV-HCV
description: Blood test to check if you are infected with HIV, HCV or HBSAG(Hepatitis B surface antigen)

name: TBIC(Total Iron Binding Capacity)
description: Measures your blood's ability to attach to iron and carry it throughout your body

name: Ferririn
description: Measures a blood protein that contains iron and shows whether blood has too much or too little iron.

name: Transferin Saturation
description: Measures the amount of iron bound to the protein transferrin that carries iron in your blood

name: Serum haptoglobin
description: Measures the amount of haptoglobin in your blood

name: Follic Acid
description: Checks for levels of folate in your blood and red blood cells

name: Serum FSH(Follicle-Stimulating Hormone)
description: This test measures the level of follicle-stimulating hormone (FSH) in your blood

name: LH(Luteinizing Hormone)
description: This test measures the level of luteinizing hormone (LH) in your blood
